name: tems-frontend-monorepo
description: TEMS Frontend Monorepo - Role-based PWAs for Transportation Enterprise Management

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev -w driver-pwa" "npm run dev -w operations-pwa" "npm run dev -w safety-pwa" "npm run dev -w fleet-pwa"
scripts.build:all: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w driver-pwa && npm run build -w operations-pwa && npm run build -w safety-pwa && npm run build -w fleet-pwa
scripts.build:driver: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w driver-pwa
scripts.build:operations: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w operations-pwa
scripts.build:safety: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w safety-pwa
scripts.build:fleet: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w fleet-pwa
